name: Quick Square
description:
Quick Square is not just a square, it is a completely new form of life in a vibrant world full of danger and adventure!

In the game, you have to move very carefully across square platforms and collect coins.

Game features:
  • Difficult levels
  • Convenient management
  • Bright character
  • Collecting valuable coins
  • Teleports
  • Horizontal and vertical movement along the level.
